$Log: euc.elem_gk.xml,v $
Revision 1.1  2009-11-23 18:46:53  rsingh04
moved more xml files around based on copyright status

Revision 1.4  2009/01/16 20:00:04  rsingh04
fixed some more entities and chunking

Revision 1.3  2009/01/15 21:58:10  rsingh04
lots of cleanup to chunking schemes, entities, head tags, etc

Revision 1.2  2005/08/01 21:17:14  packel
removed stray item tags

	Revision 1.1  2005/07/25 14:33:11  packel
	Converted to XML
	
Revision 1.11  2004/06/02 19:16:22  lcerrato
missing div for 7.20; added without checking source

Revision 1.10  2004/01/20 17:22:06  dasmith
Made DIV types explicit on all elements, since the inheritance behavior
didn't survive XML conversion.

Revision 1.9  2003/08/29 19:04:45  lcerrato
changed TEI header to reflect correct edition

Revision 1.8  2003/07/01 22:16:08  yorkc
Updated texts to TEI P4 and Perseus P4 extensions; minor cleanup (esp. character encodings and typos.)

Revision 1.7  2000/10/17 17:40:32  lcerrato
fixed numeration problem at book 7 definitions

Revision 1.6  2000/03/04 20:34:30  dasmith
Added separate funder entity to TEI header.

Revision 1.5  2000/02/11 00:51:31  dasmith
Type all DIVs properly.
Write refsDecl that works for whole document.

Revision 1.4  2000/02/10 20:58:15  dasmith
Added refsDecl for definitions, etc.

Revision 1.3  1997/12/01 23:05:36  textgod
Tagged points and line segments as NUMs.

Revision 1.2  1997/12/01 22:51:02  textgod
New header.
